A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
The movie is terrible. The following will contain spoilers so beware. 



First they just lifted a handful of elements from both empire and Jedi to create a weak story strung together with Mary Poppins Leia\, a super strong and smart\, yet weak and dumb Snoke that gets killed easier than Sean Bean in about anything. Benicio Del Toro shows up because Disney thinks he should be in every space franchise. The plot moves slower than molasses in Alaska in January. It also jumps around so much\, so very much. The Jedi training was so weak and dumb. At least Empire gave us a rocky like training montage. IMDb and tomatoes rating it highly is shocking. It belongs with the prequels\, quietly tucked away on a vga in the attic nevertheless to Be seen again.
